text:
e="preserve">Hassan Hosny () (June 19, 1936 – May 30, 2020) was an Egyptian actor and comedian. He was known for his roles in "El Nazer" ("The headmaster") (2000), "El basha telmiz" (2004) and "Zaky Chan" (2005). He was known as the Joker of Egyptian cinema. He was born in Cairo.
Hosny died of a heart attack in Cairo on May 30, 2020 at the age of 88.
